price: Bali muabudu Mwenyezi Mungu tu, na uwe miongoni mwa wenye kushukuru.
arabic: بَلِ ٱللَّهَ فَٱعۡبُدۡ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلشَّٰكِرِينَ
footnotes: Ewe Mtume! Usiwakubalie kwa hayo wanayo kutaka, bali muabudu Mwenyezi Mungu peke yake, na uwe katika wanao mshukuru Yeye kwa neema zake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: bali al-laha fa-uʿ'bud wakun mina al-shākirīna
